title: Bug 124597Error message pop up which from length of JSExpression is error
description: Details:Error message pop up which from length of JSExpression is error Step:1.New a datasource and dataset contain "row["First"]"2.Insert a table in layout and a data in details3.Input "row["FIRST"].length" in data expression4.PreviewActual result:"FIRST" is a error input words, but it can preview some words in table:org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.script.DataExceptionMocker@1502283But it has not pop up some error message.Expection result:Pop up an error message
